title.rendered: In early December 2021, the 57th and 58th nations ratified the Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons!

content.rendered:
The movement is growing to PROHIBIT NUCLEAR WEAPONS worldwide.

The Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons (TPNW) was ratified by the 50th nation in October 2020.  Since then, several more nations have ratified the Treaty.  The 57th and 58th nations ratified it in early December 2021.

See information about the TPNW at www.icanw.org

Mainstream news media in the U.S. are ALMOST TOTALLY IGNORING this bold, historic effort for peace, so “WE THE PEOPLE” must educate the American people and organize skillfully to promote the Treaty!
